results.deck: CD Projekt was founded in 1994 by Marcin Iwiński and Michał Kiciński. It is a company which makes video games and publishes them in Poland. They also publish old games through their online distribution platform, Good Old Games (gog.com)
results.description:
CD Projekt was founded in 1994 by Marcin Iwiński and Michał Kiciński. It is a company which makes video games and publishes them in Poland.

They have made two games to date, The Witcher and its sequel Assassins of Kings. Third game, Cyberpunk, a futuristic RPG was announced in 2012.
results.name: CD Projekt Sp. z o.o.

game.name: Mount and Blade: With Fire & Sword

concept.name: Games That Ask You to "Press Start" But Will Accept Other Buttons
Something is Up in This Small Town
